sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_kmf.KmfKeyLifecycleRelativeFields</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>KmfKeyLifecycleRelativeFields</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var KmfKeyLifecycleRelativeFields = Class.create();
KmfKeyLifecycleRelativeFields.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
 
	process: function(tableName) {
		return this.transform(new sn_kmf_ns.KmfLifecycleDefaultsAPI().getSupportedRelativeFields());
	},
	/**
	 * Storing a JavaScript object in the Glide cache and retrieving it is possible,
	 * but it 'objectifies' arrays, transforming them in the following ways:
	 * 1) [] => {}
	 * 2) ["one", "two"] => {"0": "one", "1": "two"}
	 *
	 * @param input an array object retrieved from the Glide cache
	 * @return a native array equivalent to the input object
	 */
	transform: function(input) {
		var result = [];

		if (gs.nil(input))
			return [];

		for (var property in input)
			result.push(input[property]);
			
		return result;
	},
    type: 'KmfKeyLifecycleRelativeFields'
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2019-04-03 18:27:57</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>0855659277203300fecfd0adda1061ce</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>KmfKeyLifecycleRelativeFields</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="ServiceNow Key Management Framework" source="sn_kmf">c515f25b53332300cd1eddeeff7b126e</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="ServiceNow Key Management Framework">c515f25b53332300cd1eddeeff7b126e</sys_scope>

    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
